A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Long time star wars fan\, almost the same age as Rian Johnson. I opened this account to get over my despair. I left the theater with a strange feeling which has gotten worse over the last few days. There were some iconic scenes in this movie. But the plot and sub-plots lacked imagination.  I think my despair comes from a) what they did to Luke Skywalker. i don't see how anyone my own age could get this so wrong b) i thought TFA was a great movie\, that offered multiple possibilities moving forward in the 8th Star Wars continuum\, but this movie felt like let's pretend TFA never happened.
